Package com.projectps.buildingmanagement.controllers.pages

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
com.projectps.buildingmanagement.controllers.pages.CustomerController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/customer") public class CustomerController extends Object
Controller class for managing customer-related pages.
